items.title: Pentagon to use $130 million anonymous donation to help pay troops
items.description: The amount is less than a day’s worth of salaries. Fiscal policy experts say the move also raises legal questions.

items.title: House Minority Leader Jeffries endorses Zohran Mamdani
items.description: Jeffries, who represents a Brooklyn district, had faced questions for months over why he hadn’t endorsed Mamdani in the New York City mayoral race.
